exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "Rbar_mult a (Sup_seq u)" in the current goal.
Found no subterm matching "Rbar_opp (Sup_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_opp (Rbar_mult a (u n))))" in the current goal.

exceptions.tactic: rewrite (is_inf_opp_sup_seq (fun n => Rbar_mult a (u n)) (Rbar_mult a (Sup_seq u))).
exceptions.exn: The LHS of (is_inf_opp_sup_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_mult a (u n)) (Rbar_mult a (Sup_seq u))) (is_inf_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_opp ((fun n0 : nat => Rbar_mult a (u n0)) n)) (Rbar_opp (Rbar_mult a (Sup_seq u)))) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment a : R u : nat -> Rbar H : 0 <= a Unable to unify "Rbar_mult a (Inf_seq u)" with "Inf_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_mult a (u n))".

original: intros a u H. rewrite <- (Sup_seq_scal_l a u H). rewrite <- (Inf_opp_sup (fun n => Rbar_mult a (u n))). rewrite (is_inf_opp_sup_seq (fun n => Rbar_mult a (u n)) (Rbar_mult a (Sup_seq u))). reflexivity.
